original_title:
...the way he sits is so gay.
  — The Donald
article_summary: Article discusses criticism of Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's seating posture, with users comparing it to a stereotypical gay man's, and discussing his perceived lack of masculinity and authenticity. The key takeaway is that the article reflects a negative and derogatory portrayal of Trudeau based on his seating posture and perceived sexuality.</s>
